title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024) shall come into operation:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick) 

and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited local government (mayor limerick) miscellaneous provision act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024) shall come into operation:
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick) and 
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1, other than sections 4 and 5; 

(b) 

subsection (3) of section 13 insofar as it provides for a definition 
of “mayoral by-election”; 

(c) 

section 20; 

(d) Part 5; 

(e) Part 8 insofar as it is not already in operation; 

(f) Schedule 2. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 March, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [123] 3
